com.cubeia.firebase.api.server
Interface NodeListener

public interface NodeListener

This listener interfaced is used by services that wishes to be notified by the server when nodes are added or removed.

NB: Service must not block on calls to this interface, extended tasks should be performed in the background.

Author:
Larsan

Method Summary
 void nodeDestroy(NodeInfo info, boolean isPre)
          This method is called by the server when a node is destroyed.
 void nodeInit(NodeInfo info, boolean isPre)
          This method is called by the server when a node is initialized.
 void nodeStart(NodeInfo info, boolean isPre)
          This method is called by the server when a node is started.
 void nodeStop(NodeInfo info, boolean isPre)
          This method is called by the server when a node is stopped.
 

Method Detail

nodeInit

void nodeInit(NodeInfo info,
              boolean isPre)
This method is called by the server when a node is initialized. The "isPre" parameter shows if this call is made before or after init.

Parameters:
info - Node info, never null
isPre - True if this is before init, false if it is after

nodeStart

void nodeStart(NodeInfo info,
               boolean isPre)
This method is called by the server when a node is started. The "isPre" parameter shows if this call is made before or after start.

Parameters:
info - Node info, never null
isPre - True if this is before start, false if it is after

nodeStop

void nodeStop(NodeInfo info,
              boolean isPre)
This method is called by the server when a node is stopped. The "isPre" parameter shows if this call is made before or after stop.

Parameters:
info - Node info, never null
isPre - True if this is before stop, false if it is after

nodeDestroy

void nodeDestroy(NodeInfo info,
                 boolean isPre)
This method is called by the server when a node is destroyed. The "isPre" parameter shows if this call is made before or after destroy.

Parameters:
info - Node info, never null
isPre - True if this is before destroy, false if it is after
